dict.acceptation: 暖和的，温暖的；保暖的；热情的；暖调的；
加温；感兴趣；变得友善或友好；

sent.orig: The southing belt warm air one-roomed hiring contains warm air expense, the one-roomed abundance of sunshine.
sent.trans: 南向带暖气单间出租含暖气费，单间阳光充足。

sent.orig: Not a secular troubles. I ask you to warm me warm.
sent.trans: 不在为世俗烦恼、请你温暖我温暖我。

sent.orig: The water in the pool is fairly warm, but not warm enough to swim in.
sent.trans: 池里的水相当暖和，但如要游泳则还不够暖。

sent.orig: It was a warm day, warm for April.
sent.trans: 是一个温暖如四月的天气。

sent.orig: Usually, caps keep the head warm. But thinking caps keep the world warm.
sent.trans: 普通的帽子能使头部感到温暖，但是动脑筋帽子却使世界感到温暖。
